note.p: Farmer and grazier. Of Wappenham, Northamptonshire. May have died in Canada in 1883.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/924/158/1)
Northamptonshire, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1532–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 13 August 2018)
Ontario, Canada, deaths and deaths overseas, 1869–1946 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 13 August 2018)
